I agree!

•	Health and the AIDS epidemic
•	Education
•	Women’s Issues
•	Poverty
•	Development

lenders.name: Marian
lenders.loan_because: My younger brother introduced me to the site.  I am excited to lend money to other moms & women across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I have the opportunity of getting to stay at home and take care of my son.

lenders.name: Dick & Ellie
lenders.loan_because: Life has been very good to us.  It is time to repay our good fortune and help the less fortunate.  I am a firm believer in the Credit Union idea of people helping people and KIVA is the closest to that ideal.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both retired but try to stay active.

lenders.name: Mariano
lenders.loan_because: To live is to give.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an accountant for our company - a nonprofit helping families get out of poverty and into the middle class.

lenders.name: Peter S Haines
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people and give something back.

lenders.name: AFC SFU
lenders.loan_because: SFU gives back!

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: the interest I might earn from this money pales in comparison to the good it can do for folks actually working to make things better for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is important to give to help others realize their goals and dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: As a financial planner I help people accumulate and invest their money for their futures. I also help people with business planning and try to encourage my clients to give to others as well.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I've been to the field and seen microfinance work.
lenders.occupational_info: I design features and functionality for the website that our field partners use to partner with Kiva.

lenders.name: karey
lenders.loan_because: it reminds me and my children how we are all connected
lenders.occupational_info: I now stay home and care for my home, pets, and children

lenders.name: promise
lenders.loan_because: because i dont have enough money to buy the required machines i need to do my business
lenders.occupational_info: i make aluminium fixtures and fittings that windows and doors and i that glass doors

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs some help!
lenders.occupational_info: I help my co-workers and customers to understand technical aspects of our lighting products.  I am good with computers and technology and use them to create "point by point" simulations.

lenders.name: Rong Guan
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Fun

lenders.name: Arne
lenders.loan_because: The world is full of people who have less than I do, I like helping someone create the business that will sustain them

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people.  It makes me feel good about myself and it shows a good example to my kids.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the real estate community that I live in.  I help friends and neighbors sell their homes.  I also sell homes to people who are interested in the Trinity area of Florida.

lenders.name: Gloria
lenders.occupation: Secretary, non-profit in U.S. and Malawi, Africa.
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of people to work hard and lift themselves and their families out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy contributing to uplifting humanity.

lenders.name: Raphael
lenders.loan_because: In my small way, I want to empower others

lenders.name: Philipp
lenders.loan_because: I have seen poverty.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I am a big fan of smiling -- and helping other makes me smile real big. =)

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.  Helping people is what I do everyday for a living - giving back is just another dimension.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell real estate (homes and condos) in the Tampa Bay area but specialize in a family friendly community called Westchase.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: Giving is the ultimate gift!

lenders.name: Yvette & Kyle
lenders.loan_because: we enjoy helping people start their own businesses and be self sufficient.

lenders.name: Allen Whittom
lenders.loan_because: It might help some peoples.

lenders.name: abby
lenders.loan_because:
there can be no doubt that God has given to us the 
work of justice in the world
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at Vanderbilt University

lenders.name: Tania
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of a reason Why not to!

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a little help sometimes.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: it feels so good to know that you could be making a huge difference to someone's life. I especially like the fact that these people have the ideas and drive to become entrepreneurs and we are helping to provide the funds to make it possible.

lenders.name: Soroptimist Ashland
lenders.loan_because: We love the idea of women helping women.
lenders.occupational_info: Our organization focuses on helping women and girls locally and globally.

lenders.name: Peter & Francois
lenders.loan_because: Just a few dollars goes a long way. We believe that Kiva is a vehicle for personal and community betterment.

lenders.name: Clark
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough  to be in a position where I can help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help make the internet

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because:
hardworking people deserve opportunities of a better life for themselves and their family.  

Money comes and goes, and I really don't need another bag from Nordstrom..

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should have access to financial services and credit, regardless of their income or their loan's ability to generate revenue for banks.
lenders.occupational_info: I study political science.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.occupation: follow your bliss, even if it keeps changing!
lenders.loan_because: people helping people works.  I have been helped by many friends, family, and strangers.
lenders.occupational_info: I started out importing handicrafts from small family businesses in Central America and Asia which I would sell at my local flea market. I did wholesale and retail stores for over 10 years, and now I am doing property investment and developement.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance!

lenders.name: Olive
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help others.

lenders.name: Ms. Gomez
lenders.loan_because: I have always believed in helping people, especially the less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 3rd grade bilingual students.

lenders.name: deb
lenders.loan_because: My kids and I believe in helping others. My kids take great pleasure in being a big part of making the the world a better place.

lenders.name: Chris Wingert
lenders.loan_because:
"He who oppresses the poor shows contempt for their Maker, but whoever is kind to the needy honors God."
Proverbs 14:31
lenders.occupational_info: Professional Soccer Player

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help people become self-sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach university students the basics of starting and operating a business.  I specialize in the training and treatment of employees.

lenders.name: Bryan
lenders.loan_because:
I've traveled to Southeast Asia - I fell in love Cambodian culture, and Vietnamese food.

I want to make the world a better place - and lending through Kiva lets me feel that one person can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a cook / chef at a restaurant.

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give. ~ Winston Churchill

lenders.name: Ericka
lenders.loan_because: I want to change the world, even if it is just a little bit at a time!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Iowa.  I am studying International Studies and German and I hope to go on to get my Global Studies Masters in Freiburg, Germany.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I understand how difficult it is to start a business and keep it going.
lenders.occupational_info: International Investment, Day trading, Sales, and Advertising.

lenders.name: Dusty
lenders.loan_because: Feels good to be doing some good worldwide. In memory of Dusty, my big Maine Coon cat who died 2006
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner as well.

lenders.name: Chad Graves
lenders.loan_because: "Every man must decide whether he will walk in the light of creative altruism or in the darkness of destructive selfishness." -Martin Luther King, Jr.

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy it.

lenders.name: Charlie
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me abundantly and I am giving back a little of what He has given me.
lenders.occupational_info: I guard my house.  I chase away squirrels, stray cats, and the mailman.

lenders.name: Edmond
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much in my own life. I want to be able to give the opportunity to someone to make a difference in their own life. I am pretty sure they have a greater need for the money than I do.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I must lift as I climb.
lenders.occupational_info: In charge of Transit Informatics Research efforts.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: Its a chance to share the wealth.  As an entrepreneur myself I appreciate the help of someone to grow my business.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a computer consulting company in Ottawa Canada.  We specialize in helping government organizations access, organize, analyze and report on their data.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.occupation: home duties/ part time ofice work

lenders.name: Gatot
lenders.loan_because: I need some money about US$1000 to sponsorize for my work in the entertainment world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a owner of the company - it calls The Production, which have some idea and goal to start business in a content provider, like SMS engine, and work together with 5 big operator company in Indonesia.

lenders.name: Doug / Meri
lenders.loan_because: I need to 'PAY IT FORWARD'.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the construction industry. The company I work for is large with many projects under way at the same time. I help to keep projects efficient and profitable. My wife is a private tutor with many years of experience having homeschooled our children as well as many others.

lenders.name: Anna Maria
lenders.occupational_info: I help educate doctors on specific medications that are available to patients.  I also help couples plan their weddings.

lenders.name: La Schaap
lenders.loan_because:
It gives me great joy to help others to help themselves.   Watching a gift given to me by my uncle a few years ago give time and time again.  Truly a gift that keeps on giving! 
 It makes me smile each time I make a loan too... it just feels good!
lenders.occupational_info: Full time Mother of 2 amazing kids... and Organic Farmer.

lenders.name: Rhonda
lenders.loan_because: I think loaning money to help another person work their way out of poverty is wonderful and empowering.

lenders.name: Al
lenders.loan_because: I've seen through Habitat For Humanity that a hand-up is better than a hand-out. Moreove, if people have the initiative to improve their condition in life; it's rewarding to lend a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I retired from teaching woodworking and building construction courses to hight school students and now keep active remodelling houses, building custom cabinets, machining decorative moldings for historic buildings and making custom furniture. I reciently returned from a construction mission trip to Guatemala and am considering similar mission trips. I am also activel involved with fundraising for a Cancer Foundation.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel warm & fuzzy inside.

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.loan_because: I am doing well and want to help others.
